name: Escape from Paper World
description:
What happened to you?! You were blown back into the drawing board?!

Escape from Paper World is a short 2D-Platformer which tells a story of you, buffed and magnificent pixel working class hero, who for the unknown reasons is thrown back into the drawing board, full of sketches made with paper and pencil!

You feel yourself an already well established and self-realized character! This is not where you belong! You need to portal back into your own world of marvel and old school pixels.

Let's go find your scattered portal equipment! Every self-respecting pixel character carries them on em' at all times... right? Better to avoid those kawaii airplanes thou!

This video game is a product of Game Jam co-operation by  ECC College of Computer & Multimedia and Centria University of Applied Sciences, Pelipaja- program!

Theme of the Game Jam  was  Paper and Pencil!
